data.title: Kill Bill!
data.meta_description:
I’m doing a likeness study of actor/ martial arts legend Gordon Lui! 
You might know him he played Pei Mei in the Kill Bill movies. 
I plan on making him as Pei Mei.[ATTACH=CONFIG]290904[/ATTACH]
data.text:
I’m doing a likeness study of actor/ martial arts legend Gordon Lui!

You might know him he played Pei Mei in the Kill Bill movies.

I plan on making him as Pei Mei.

Attachments

Nice start!

from what I can tell it looks like you need a little less double eyelids (the fold of the skin bove the eyelid needs to come down over the eyelid more. You almost cant see the eyelid.) and all in all you should pull his upper eyelid down a little more it will elongate his eyes a bit more. oh and eventually you might need to step out of symmetry which really helps. what I usually do now is make a new layer for all unsymmetrical changes.
